title: Put a smile on your face! You've just found the right place!
posting_body: ['Come and see what the fuss is all about at Brooks Crossing Apartments, located at 8050 Taylor Road Riverdale, GA 30274.', 'Description', '........', 'Brooks Crossing Apartments is in a fabulous location.', 'Not only are we within walking distance to public transportation , but we are only minutes from Hartsfield Jackson Airport, Clayton State University, Southern Regional Medical and numerous restaurants .', 'show contact info', 'Bedrooms', '........... 3', 'Bathrooms', '......... 2', 'Sq Footage', '......... 1163', 'sq ft', 'Unit Price', '........... $1867/Month', 'Lease Term', '........ 6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Amenity List', '......', '✓ Business Center', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Courtyard', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ Gated', '✓ Maintenance on site', '✓ Picnic Areas', '✓ Smoke Free', '✓ Sparkling Pool', '✓ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '✓ Covered Parking', '✓ Fax/Copy Services', '✓ Laundry Facilities', '✓ Monthly Resident Events', '✓ Multi Use Room', '✓ Online Services', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Resident Referral Bonuses', '✓ Sports Courts', '✓ Tennis Court', 'Unit Features', '.....', '✓ Air Conditioning', '✓ Cable Ready', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Deck', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Disposal', '✓ Fireplace', '✓ Freezer', '✓ Heating', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Vaulted Ceilings', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '✓ Wi-Fi', '✓ Window Coverings', 'Our Pet Policy', '...', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Leasing Hours', '...', 'Mon -
